cells.data:
### Questions
1) Does order matter?
2) Are there duplicates?
3) What is the domain of your inputs?
4) Can we early-exit in our algorithm, e.g. discover we're done before the algorithm technically completes?
  * Early-exit on a bubble sort pass if nothing was swapped
5) Do we have to cache state in our algorithm? Can we use just a `tmp` var? How about re-using the original allocated space?
